comment: Not very smooth (tried at pot still Glasgow

Paint thinner, citrus nose. Not as bad as expected. Strawberry banana caramel. Decidedly harsh. 
8/16/19
Boozy butterscotch on the nose.  Clean smooth burn on the palate.  Very  reminiscent of a strong Speyside.  This was a favorite.
not bad for the price, not impressive overall
Karmellubragð og örlítið fruity. Sterkt í prósentum en miðlungs í bragði.
